author: Anvit Dave
API: PATH /signin (POST) :- (tutor,student) users can signin and get token.(Public)
PATH /assignment (GET) :- (tutor,student) students and tutor can get their assignments *filter options* are includedn in this api.(Protected)
PATH /assignment (POST) :- (tutor) tutor can add new assignments.(Protected)
PATH /assignment (PUT):- (tutor) tutor can update existing assignments.(Protected)
PATH /assignment (DELETE):- (tutor) tutor can delete existing assignments.(Protected)
PATH /submission (GET) :- (tutor,student) student will get his/her all submission and tutor will get submissions of his/her assignmets from all students.(Protected)
PATH /submission (POST):- (student) student can submit his/her assignment on this route.(Protected)
